commits.message: Transitions for when horse steps on rattlesnake.  Fixed so that loading-cart sound matches for regular and horse carts.
Fence kit now containable in a cart.  Thus, you can carry one with you with your horsecart to set up an outpost.
Loose iron ore is 2x as common.  Was made 10x less common when iron mines were buffed, but now with the 2x, loose ore is 5x less common than it used to be long ago.
